title: Facebook ships an experimental app for couples
description: Today, Facebook quietly released a new app for couples called Tuned. The new release is a multimedia messaging app designed to help significant others communicate. The app is available for download in the U.S. and Canada, app analytics firm Sensor Tower tells…
content: Today Facebook quietly released a new app for couples called Tuned The new release is a multimedia messaging app designed to help significant others communicate The app is available for download in the U S and Canada app analytics firm Sensor Tower tell chars
